mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dw_card_stream (id, order_id, card_id, user_id, begined_at, finished_at, stream_type, real_balance, pre_value, change_value, cur_value, real_pre_value, real_change_value, cur_real_value, operator_src, operator_id, remarks) VALUES (NULL, #{orderId}, #{cardId}, #{userId}, #{beginedAt}, #{finishedAt}, #{streamType}, #{realBalance}, #{preValue}, #{changeValue}, #{curValue}, #{realPreValue}, #{realChangeValue}, #{curRealValue}, #{operatorSrc}, #{operatorId}, #{remarks})
